1.0.name: wordpress/wps-coupon-management
1.0.description:
WPS coupon management gives you full control for show or hide coupon based on coupon expiry date, Auto coupon code generation or custom coupon code placement,coupon images directly selection from wordpress media gallery.

Front coupons view with auto coupon loading based Ajax call till end of the coupons.

Features

  • Custom post type for discount coupon management
  • Due to custom post type user will get same coupon add/edit/delete option like post
  • Random Coupon Code generation while adding coupon OR Manual code entries allows
  • Coupon Images directly adding from default Wordpress media library.
  • Sort code used for coupons listing at front view.
  • Custom URL setting for each coupon to redirect at external site.
  • Coupon list view with Auto loading, based mouse scroll events and coupons are loading via AJAX call which will not load all the coupons at once and give smooth interface to users.
  • Tested upto
